#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int num=n;
        int sum=0;
        while(num)
        {
            sum+=num%10;
            num/=10;
        }
        cout<<n%sum<<endl;
    }
}
